casebody.data:
John BREWER
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 5, 2019

Daniel Fernandes Lage, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Rocco A. Chiarenza, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner John Brewer's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 556, 208 A.3d 314 (2019), is denied.
